testCases.name: test_case_0
testCases.input:
Customer Support Request:
Hello, I tried to reset my password 3 times but never received the email. 
Can you please help me access my account? This is urgent as I need to submit 
my monthly report by end of day today.
testCases.actualOutput: of the Customer's Issue: - The customer is unable to reset their password, preventing access to their account. This is critical as the customer needs to submit a report by the end of the day, indicating a high urgency and stress level. #### Technical Details, Customer Sentiment, and Underlying Problems: - Technical Details: The issue may be due to a malfunction in the password reset feature or a delay in the reset email delivery. - Customer Sentiment: The sentiment is urgent and stressed due to
context:
Customer Support Request:
Hello, I tried to reset my password 3 times but never received the email. 
Can you please help me access my account? This is urgent as I need to submit 
my monthly report by end of day today.

metricsData.name: Hallucination
metricsData.reason: The score is 0.00 because the actual output fully aligns with the context and contains no contradictions or unsupported information.

metricsData.name: Answer Relevancy
metricsData.reason: The score is 1.00 because the response was fully relevant and addressed the customer's urgent password reset issue without any irrelevant statements. Great job staying focused and helpful!
